nodes.text: The orphan farm of Lund Gourley, Durkteel, was a farm in which orphans under the care of Marn grew and harvested hemmel crops. Marn provided her wards with water and food, and would often send them to the local Phirmist temple by drift shuttle. Mattis Banz grew up at the orphan farm until the Resistance noticed his actions and recruited him into their fight against the First Order.
